title: About Us
body:
Welcome to CMB Quiz Hub, your source for engineering quizzes aimed at helping students prepare for competitive exams.

Founded in 2025, our goal is to provide a simple, user-friendly platform for practicing with relevant questions. We focus on accuracy and a clean user experience to aid your learning.

We hope you find our quizzes helpful. If you have any questions or comments, please feel free to reach out via the Contact Us page.
